name: Gerard Dacudao
text: Ikaw may duda Roy.  And you have just admitted to a bias a priori.  Therefore I conclude it is a question of trust.  Thats ok.  We trust Rody, you dont.  Its called freedom.  However, I dare say, what your alternative?  Kung wala, lets just all agree to disagree. Diba? Stalemate ito on the basis of freedom to trust or not.  Ganun lang ka simple!  ;)
